definitions.body: taste of manna Ex 16:31 (P), Nu 11:8 (JE), cf. v:Nu 11:8; in juice of purslain Job 6:6; of Moab under fig. of wine Je 48:11 (‖[[רֵיחַ]]).

fig. judgement, discretion, discernment, 1Sa 25:33, Pr 11:22, Job 12:20, so [[טוּב טַעַם וׇדַעַת לַמְּדֵנִי]] Ps 119:66; ´[[מְשִׁיבֵי ט]] Pr 26:16 those answering discretion, i.e. discreetly: [[שׁנה]] [[טעם]] change, disguise one's judgement, sense 1Sa 21:13, Ps 34:1, of David feigning madness.
(late Aramaism, cf. Da 3:10 etc.) decision, decree [[טַעַם מֶלָח וּגְּדׂלָיו]] Jon 3:7.
